description: An Italian classic with a twist! These vegan stuffed shells are bursting with creamy dairy-free ricotta and baked in velvety butternut squash sauce. Perfect for holiday dinners, or any occasion worthy of some serious vegan comfort food!
name: Vegan Butternut Squash Stuffed Shells
recipeIngredient: 3 pounds butternut squash, (diced (1/2 inch, about 6 cups)
1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours and drained)
7 ounces extra firm tofu, (drained (half of a 14 ounce package)
6 ounces dried jumbo pasta shells (18 - 20 shells - half of a 12 ounce box)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the onions and squash on a large baking sheet or in a roasting pan and toss with the olive oil until coated.
Roast the squash and onion for about 30 minutes, until tender, flipping about halfway through. Leave the oven on when you remove the baking sheet.
